content:
/>
V.iii.1.B.2.e
.
Rating Dupuytren’s Contracture of the Hand
The rating schedule does not specifically list Dupuytren’s contracture as a disease entity; therefore, assign an evaluation on the basis of limitation of finger movement.
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section B - Musculoskeletal Disabilities of the Extremities and Spine
citation: Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section B
